name: The Commuter
description:
Game made for Nordic Game Jam 2020

Story

During your morning routine, you take the train to work. While waiting for the train, you experience daydreaming. Something is calling you in your dreams, that you want to find. But you can't miss your train to work. So you will have to continue the dream the next day, when your train arrives.

How to play

Before you wake up from the daydreaming you must go around and solve puzzles. When you wake up (when the timer hits 0), it's a new day and you start in the metro again. 

When solving a puzzle some events, only take action the next day. 

You win by pressing E on the thing at the end :)

Controls

AD: Walk

Space: Jump

W: Enter

E: Interact

Since this is a gamejam project, the exit button is missing. use Alt+F4 :D
